message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.CR, cs.IR 

The paper deals with the problem of person identification/recognition using images, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a framework for online update of classifiers, which involves optimization and selection of informative samples, indicating the use of machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also deals with multi-camera data, which could fall under multimedia (cs.MM) or computer networks (cs.CR). The use of sparse reconstruction based classifiers could also indicate the use of information retrieval (cs.IR).
